Name: Delete Common Web Browser Caches
Description: Delete the temp internet files from all common web browser caches

Name: Delete temporary files
Description: Temporary files will be deleted from the computer.

Name: Delete Temp Files & Empty Recycle Bin
Description: Temporary files and recycle bin content will be deleted from the computer.

Name: Fix issues with teams
Description: Solve issues like, teams failing to start, not receiving messages etc

Name: "Teams meeting" button is missing
Description: Add the Teams meeting button to Outlook, note outlook will close and then open again automatically.

Name: Restart OneDrive
Description: Solve some issues like, synchronization issues, A red cross is displayed, OneDrive opens and closes

Name: Reset OneDrive
Description: Solve issues like, OneDrive does not start: error 0x8004def4, Your device is slow: OneDrive uses a lot of memory on your device,

Name: Run Onedrive
Description: This action allow you to start your OneDrive client
